articles.title: Sunak's wealth and right-wing politics mean he is far from representative, British Asians say - CNN
articles.description: Rishi Sunak rise to the premiership has sparked a debate among many British Asians that lies at the intersection of race, class and politics.
articles.content:
Orange and pink fireworks colored the skies over south London on Monday, as members of the local South Asian community celebrated Diwali.

articles.title: Blackpink Singapore concert tickets to go on sale from Nov 21 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Here's how you can score tickets for Blackpink's concert in Singapore on May 13, 2023 at the National Stadium as part of their Born Pink world tour.
articles.content:
Blinks, get ready. Tickets for Blackpink's Singapore concert go on sale at 10am on Nov 21.
